repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This is a multiple text manuscript. It contains Saṃkalpasūryodayavivaraṇa is a commentary on the drama Saṃkalpasūryodaya. This text seems rare as a very few manuscripts of Saṃkalpasūryodayavivaraṇa are mentioned in the New Catalogus Catalogorum. The author as mentioned in New Catalogus Catalogorum is Nārāyaṇa / Nārāyaṇācārya. Tarkavāda is written by Gadādhara. It is a Nyāya text. After the end of the Tarkavāda there are two blank folio and then third text begins which is written in Telugu script. The text starts at image 153 and continues till image 208. Image 209 is a blank folio. Before beginning of the Tarkavāda there are 2 blank folio at the beginning and on the verso of the second blank folio has something written in three columns.

msItem.title: Saṃkalpasūryodayavivaraṇa
msItem.author: Nārāyaṇa / Nārāyaṇācārya.
msItem.incipit: sv- 1v 1 (2 illegible syllables.) ridharma(vāpmai?) ptākta āpadhāno vikarmavyātivyāpte (1 illegible syllable.) ptātaida (illegible 1 syllable) navadhā (gap due to broken folio.)
msItem.explicit:
sv- 89v 7 pāraṃ vartadhīnaṃ śīlamabhyāstinivartaṃ vakta śyonāvacanaviṣayaḥ sarvānrdhāmitvā devamuktam .. iti saṃkalpasūryo (loss of a few syllables due to broken folio.)
89v 8 (loss of a few syllables due to broken folio.) [aṃ]ka .. samāptañca vivaraṇam . hariḥ oṃ kavitārkikasiṃhāya kalyāṇaguṇaśāline śrīmate veṃkaṭeśāya ve[dhūlagu] (loss of a few syllables due to broken folio.)
89v 9 [inferred line ] ādinakatvakaiya ? native yoga iti ? na tat

msItem.title: Tarkavāda
msItem.author: Gadādhara
msItem.incipit: tarka-1v 1(gap of a few syllables due to broken folio.) prāmāṇyaśrayajñānaṃ gṛhītañna vā adyeva ka(inferred rṇā) na ghraheha prāmāṇyaṃ gṛhītamutta aye (illegible 2 syllables.) the saṃśayānupapattiḥ muna ..
msItem.explicit: tarka-[60v 4] tyatvāpya (gap of three syllables due to wormholes.) saṃbandhatāyā (gap of one syllable due to wormholes) ndha kṛtaivava svīkārāt

support.p: Thin palm leaf as cover guard.

extent.measure: 2 guard foilo, 4 blank folio and 202 written folio

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals in the left margin.
supportDesc.condition: Extremely broken folio, very difficult to read the text.

additions.desc: tarka-1v has śubhamastu written in the left margin.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.
